family_values: Commitment to family growth and fertility
Community engagement and local relationship building
Critical thinking skills to identify and resist ideological manipulation
Appreciation for traditional gender roles within family structures
Emphasis on real-world skills over digital dependencies
Civic responsibility and active participation in local governance

content_to_avoid.Description: Content promoting child-free lifestyles or framing children as burdens
Material encouraging early medical transitions or fluid gender identities in minors
Excessive promotion of professional therapy as a substitute for family/community support
Narratives that frame Western or traditional cultures as inherently oppressive
Content that prioritizes personal brand-building or materialism over family/community bonds
Frameworks that fragment identity and pit demographic groups against each other
Extreme environmental narratives that induce anxiety or discourage family formation
Content promoting promiscuity or non-traditional relationship structures to young audiences
Material that mocks or undermines traditional religious beliefs and practices

recommendations: Healthy ways to discuss personal feelings with family
